page.title: 14THE PASTURES CHURCH
page.content: {The Pastures Free Methodist Church}was built in 1970. It replaced the{Oxford {Road Church}which was knocked down to make room for a car-park and moved out to where the people were living, on the edge of town, in{Downley. They have two{services}every Sunday. They sing hymms and choruses and have a children's talk. While the children are in their{Sunday School}classes the Minister preaches a sermon to the adults. Before the evening service there is a{prayer time}in the vestry. There are many childrens activities like{Girls Brigade, Cubs, Scouts, {Beavers, This 'n' That Club}(for the under 12s),{youth group}and{16+ group. For the adults there are the{Wednesday {Fellowship, The Pastures Folk Singing {Group, Open House}and{Mother and {Toddler Club.
